模块 application.project4_pizzaordermanager

类 Order

java.lang.Object
application.project4_pizzaordermanager.Order
public class Order extends Object
Order Class that store customer's phone number and the pizza list he/she orders.
作者:
Yuchen Wei, Denghao Sun

  • 方法详细资料

    • getOrderNumber

      public String getOrderNumber()
      返回:
      the order number of the given order.

    • getPizzas

      public ArrayList<Pizza> getPizzas()
      返回:
      the arraylist holding the pizza.

    • getSubtotal

      public double getSubtotal()
      返回:
      the subtotal price of the pizza in the given order.

    • getTax

      public double getTax()
      返回:
      the tax rate of the subtotal price of the pizza in the given order.

    • getOrderTotal

      public double getOrderTotal()
      返回:
      the total price of the pizza in the given order.

    • addPizza

      public void addPizza(Pizza pizza)
      Add the pizza into the arraylist holding pizza.
      参数:
      pizza - the selected pizza.

    • removePizza

      public void removePizza(Pizza pizza)
      Remove the pizza into the arraylist holding pizza.
      参数:
      pizza - the selected pizza.

    • isSameOrder

      public boolean isSameOrder(String number)
      Check if two orders are the same by checking customer's phone number.
      参数:
      number - the potential customer number of the order.
      返回:
      true if two orders are the same, false otherwise.
